result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ سِرَاعٗا كَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٖ يُوفِضُونَ
result.translation: Siku watakapotoka makaburini kwa upesi kama kwamba wanakimbilia mfundo,
result.footnotes: Siku watakapo tolewa makaburini mbio mbio kumwendea huyo ataye waita, kama kwamba wamemweka ufundo na wakimuabudu duniani walivyo kuwa wakimkimbilia badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu,
